scripts.dev:extension: vite build --mode extension --watch && npm run copy:extension
scripts.build:extension: vite build --mode extension && npm run copy:extension
scripts.copy:extension: mkdir -p dist && cp -r extension-build/* dist/ && cp popup-simple.html dist/popup.html && cp manifest-updated.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:extension
